name: milestone-fireworks
author: TejaswaniRai
preview: Animated fireworks celebration component for user milestones on interactive maps

props.name: isActive
props.description: Whether the fireworks animation is currently active

props.name: regions
props.type: Array<{x: number, y: number, intensity: number}>
props.description: Array of regions with coordinates and intensity for fireworks placement

props.name: duration
props.description: Duration of the fireworks animation in milliseconds

props.name: onComplete
props.description: Callback function called when animation completes

props.name: className
props.description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the container
